portray.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to describe or represent something or someone
portray.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: His most famous painting portrayed the death of Nelson.
Religion was portrayed in a negative way.
portray.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to act the part of a character in a play, film, or television programme
portray.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She portrays a dancer in the hit film.
